content.en: Thyroid nodule diagnosis: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to improve the diagnosis of thyroid nodules in ultrasound images. They are investigating whether deep learning approaches, such as convolutional neural networks, can accurately classify and predict the nature of these nodules. The goal is to develop computer-aided diagnosis systems that can assist radiologists in making more objective and reliable diagnoses, potentially reducing the need for unnecessary procedures like fine needle aspiration.
content.da: Diagnose af skjoldbruskkirtelknude: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre diagnosen af skjoldbruskkirtelknuder i ultralydsbilleder. De undersøger, om dyb læringstilgange, såsom convolutional neural networks, præcist kan klassificere og forudsige karakteren af disse knuder. Målet er at udvikle computerassisterede diagnosesystemer, der kan hjælpe radiologer med at foretage mere objektive og pålidelige diagnoser, hvilket potentielt kan reducere behovet for unødvendige procedurer som finnålsaspiration.
